item.title: 'They knew their names and ages': Rescuer tells of saving children from heli wreck
item.description:
Brave locals rescued three children from the wreckage of a helicopter crash before a farmer pulled the mangled aircraft out of the mouth of the Kekerengu River.
Two people were killed in the crash and ...
item.author: newsfeeds@nzherald.co.nz

enclosure.url: https://media.nzherald.co.nz/webcontent/image/jpg/202051/SCCZEN_151220SPLCHOPPER2_70x70.jpg?media_subtype_id=16|caption=Three passengers were airlifted to Wellington Hospital. Photo / Supplied

item.title: 'Most amazing man': Kiwi nurse dies of Covid-19 at UK hospital
item.description:
A senior Kiwi nurse in the emergency department at a hospital in England has died after contracting Covid-19.
New Zealander Barclay Mason, had worked at Princess Alexandra Hospital in Harlow, a town ...
